name: Play Girls
description:
Test your speed, flow with the rhythm and earn points by pressing the keys at the right moment. Unlock new stages by scoring certain amounts of points.

If you’d ever want to rest between engaging rounds, entertain yourself by entering free camera mode - you can move the camera wherever you’d like and enjoy the girls show from any distance or angle.

Don’t forget to discover the private mode, which allows you to choose one Girl, her outfit and the scene - have a good time watching her moves!

Features:

- Challenge mode
- Free fly camera mode
- Private mode
- Different stages
- Unique music
- High quality anime models
- Diverse dance styles
